Additionally, I have joined several Members of the House on a bipartisan resolution letting President Trump know he has our support if further actions under the Defense Production Act are necessary. #DefenseProductionActRes
I applaud the businesses all across the nation, including several local companies, who have volunteered to produce much needed protective equipment and #COVID19 testing kits. #DefenseProductionActRes

Whether we are talking about protective masks and gloves, hand sanitizer and disinfectant, or even ventilators, we face, or will face in the very near future, shortages of critical emergency medical supplies. #DefenseProductionActRes
As #COVID19 cases begin to spread rapidly across the country, we are in desperate need of personal protection equipment for our health care workers. #DefenseProductionActRes

According to the NAACP, there were 4,743 recorded lynchings between 1882 and 1968, and over 70% of the victims were African American.

Yesterday, I cast my vote in support of H.R. 35, the Emmett Till Antilynching Act. 

This historic anti-lynching bill would make lynching a federal hate crime.
